attributes.action: give the RSPCA inspectors power of arrest, and give heavier sentences to animal abusers/neglecters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I the undersigned, believe the Inspectors of the Royal society for the prevention of cruelty to animals should be afforded the power to arrest suspects of animal cruelty and abuse, such like the ASPCA's Humane Law Enforcement (HLE) Department, in America, and that those found guilty of neglecting or abusing animals should be given heavier sentences.
